Corrupt Nature Spirit
summons vines that lash at you
summons thorns from the ground
spits out a cloud of insects at you

A tainted and corrupt spirit emerges from the trees.
'Leave this place, fiend!' it howls.
'You shall not disturb this grove!' it screeches.
'If you seek death, you have found it!' it roars, sprouting glowing thorns from its hind.
Vampire Lord Vasilius
flies down to bite you
seeks to rend you with his nails
unleashes necromantic magic at you

A well dressed male descends from the sky.
'Welcome. You are just in time for dinner...' he laughs.
'I am the mist, and I am the land! Kneel!' he yells.
'I will drink this world dry!' he screams, sprouting bat-like wings and lunging at you.
Ancient Hag Baba Yurga
laughs maddeningly
chants in demonic tongues
breathes out a poison cloud

You approach a cozy hut, in the middle of the swamp.
An old lady steps out, holding a fresh pie and cackles.
'Rude child, I shall have to force feed you!' the hag screams as her chin, nose, and fingers start elongating.
'I shall cook and eat you!' the hag screams, completing her transformation with green skin and bulbous warts.
Avatar of Antaboros, Serpent God
conjures a rain of serpents
swings with its six scimitars
bites down with all of its serpent heads

A gollosal humanoid body steps forth, emerging out of the altar. It has six arms, each wielding a scimitar. 
Instead of a head, it has a hundred coiled serpents.
'I have devoured countless-sss worlds-sss, and this-sss one shall be no different' the colossal entity hisses.
'You witness-sss Antaboros-sss, Herald of the End Times-sss' it belches, as the temple walls begin to slither, and the hissing becomes omnipresent.
Cosmic Sentience
summons down a meteor
teleports you to a freezing planet
casts you through the cosmos

The meteor pulses with a strange colour. You find yourself in an infinite space. 
A floating white geometric entity hovers above you.
'Aaggzz Tthhrrkk Pprrxx' the entity voices a strange noise. Its arms separate into tentacles.
The infinite white space around you begins to crack, and a green and purple glow pulses through. Shards of reality hover around you.
Anthereos, The Sphinx Pharaoh
launches an arcane bolt at you
charges at you with its claws
shoots down a beam of solar energy

A majestic creature with the body of a lion, large wings, and a human head descends. 
'Kneel' it commands, as the sun rotates in the sky to hover behind it.
'The sands are eternal, and so am I' the sphinx proclaims, its eyes now glowing azure.
The sphinx flies up, and the sky turns black. The sun remains as a small white orb, resting atop the crown of the sphinx.
theAfterLife_Protocol(#)
turns on wall-mounted laser turrets
activates a laser grid that spins around the chamber
calls forth missile drones

You enter a room filled with glass canisters, each containing a body suspended in deep green liquid. 
'Systems activate' a female voice booms from the speakers.
'Chance of survival at 50%, initiate perseverance modules' the speakers announce. Some of the canisters open, and limp lifeless bodies collapse on the floor.
'Survival chance at @#@!%, purging specimens with sub 95-percentile strategy efficiency.'. More bodies fall out of their tubes. Some attempt to crawl away.
Malefius, Demon-Lich
launches a fireball
summons a flaming skull and throws it at you
swings with his necroflame blade
A demonic, winged creature stands in front of you. It turns to face you, revealing torn, blackened red skin, which glows green underneath.
'I have conquered death, what can you hope to achieve?' the undead demon taunts you.

A ghostly shape appears. 'Avenge us' it pleads. As it disappears, a pendant remains on the scorched earth beneath. 
'My phylactery! HOW!?' the demon screams.
Kath'Shagurrath, Celestial Pathogen
pulls down an obelisk, throwing it at you
summons orbs of green tentacles that flail uncontrollably
whispers inside your mind
An octopus-like head emerges from the chasm. Massive hands pull up a bat-winged upper body covered in pulsing blue veins.

An old man's voice whispers, tearfully, in your mind's ear, 'My child... What have you done with it?'. 
Images of a pulsating meteor flash before your eyes.

A woman sings through static hiss in your mind. You see the infinite cosmos, and beyond it, countless eyes. 
'Where is my mind' the lady sings operatically.
